        Fetches elements from a table in a database and populates them in a ListView based on a specific condition
        Parameters:
        listViewObject - The ListView to be populated
        tableName - The table from which the data is fetched
        conditionalColumn - The specific column from which to read the data from
        conditionalValue - The value of the conditional column

        Parameters:
        listViewObject - The ListView object that is to be populated with data

        orderBy - In case a sort is needed, it either orders by name or some other String criteria
